page.title: 11DOUNBY SCHOOL & FACILITIES
page.content: {Dounby Primary School}is open-plan. Classes One to Three are in one area while Classes Four to Seven are in another. Both of them have their own wet areas for art. In addition, there are a number of other rooms eg a nursery, community room and a TV room. Other groups also use the school. The {Senior Citizens}and{Mums and Toddlers come in once a week. In the winter nights there are a number of activities including evening classes and cookery courses. In the middle of the school there is a courtyard with a pond. Next to the school is a football field which is also used by the local team. At the moment there are eight full-time teachers, a nursery teacher as well as the headmistress and school secretary.
